analyzed: varyā gīti koṣaḥ prajñāpāramitā artha amṛta pāna paripuṣṭāḥ hi kukkuri pādāḥ tam eva artham ātmani bhagavatī nairātmā yoginīm adhimucya vadanti hā u ityādi aham bhagavatī nairātmā mahāsukha cakra sva kuṭīm dṛṣṭrā sphuṭam iti viṣaya ādi vṛndam mayā nairātmayā tasmin samaye niṣkṛntitam svayam eva ātmānam saṃbodhya vadati bho māta nairātme tat idānīm yam yam viṣaya

original: dvitīyapadena vicārasvarūpamāha pahile ityādi | ādau saṃvṛtivāsanāpuṭaṃ kāyo 'yaṃ prasūtaḥ | asya kāyasya nāḍī dvātriṃśaddevī tasya piṇḍīkramānupūrvyā sad‌guruvacanapramāṇato vicāryamāṇe sati saiva vāsanā varākī kathaṃ vidyate | na vidyate eva param || [3]

original: varyāgītikoṣaḥ [ tamevārtha mūṣakasandhyāvacanena bhusukupādāḥ pratipādayanti | nisi andhārītyādi | muṣṇātīti mūṣakaḥ sandhyāvacanena cittapavano boddhavyaḥ| nisi prajñā kaṅginā vā boddhavyā | tasyāḥ karmāṅganāyā vicitrādikṣaṇe kāyānandādivyāpāradvāreṇa kuliśāravindasaṃyoge bodhicittāmṛtāsvādāhāra sa eva mūṣakaḥ cittapavanaḥ svayaṃ karoti || [śru ] tasmin viramānandakṣaṇe śrīgurumukhalabdhopāyena drutaṃ tasya niḥsvabhābīkaraṇa' bhavati | tatkurvato bālayoginastena saṃsāracakre yātāyātaṃ dvayākāraṃ na truvyati cittaṃ ca na śobhate | tathā ca āgamaḥ- dvayākāraṃ tyāgaprakaṭapaṭusaṃvittisubhage ghanānandotkīrṇe prabalarasapūrṇāmbaratale sphuṭaṃ nānākārairupacitaśame tvantaragatai- ridaṃ tat trailokyaṃ layamiva gataṃ bhāti manasi || [ dvitīyapadena mūṣakacittasya vyavahāro 'nuvarṇyate | bhavetyādi | bhavatoti kṛtvā bhavaṃ svakārya vidārayati prakṛticāṃcalyatayā sa eṣa cittamūṣako 'nyathābhāvaṃ kurute | gatīti tiryakhnarakādidurgatipātaṃ ca svayameva utpādayati | ataścittamūṣakasya prakṛtidoṣamākalayya bho yogin [śuru] prasādāptopadeśena tasya bhāvāropaṇaṃ na kariṣyasīti || [ tṛtīyapadena tasya svarūpamāha | kāletyādi | saṃvṛtibodhicittendu nāśakatvena sa eva cittamūṣakaḥ kālaḥ | tasya piṇḍaprāhānubhede vicāreṇa bho yogin varṇopalaṃbhopadeśo na varyāyītikoṣaḥ vidyate | gaṇanamipti gussaṃpradāyāt mahāsukhakamalavanaṃ gatmā punarāgatya paramārthaśrotricittamadhupānāsvādaṃ karoti | tathā ca paradarśane mīnamāthaḥ- kahanti guru paramārthara bāṭa | karma kuraṃga samādhi kapāṭa ||
analyzed: tam eva artha mūṣaka sandhyā vacanena bhusuku pādāḥ pratipādayanti nisi andhāri ityādi muṣṇāti iti mūṣakaḥ sandhyā vacanena citta pavanaḥ boddhavyaḥ nisi prajñā vā boddhavyā tasyāḥ karma śobhate tathā ca āgamaḥ dvaya ākāram tyāga prakaṭa paṭu saṃvitti subhage ghana ānanda utkīrṇe prabala rasa pūrṇa ambara tale sphuṭam nānā ākāraiḥ upacita śame tu antara gataiḥ r idam bhāva āropaṇam na kariṣyasi iti tṛtīya padena tasya svarūpam āha kāla ityādi saṃvṛti bodhi citta indu nāśaka tvena saḥ eva cittamūṣakaḥ kālaḥ tasya piṇḍa prāha anubhede vicāreṇa bho
